program.name: libmng
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib:/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -std -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z +Onofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
rm -f config.cache ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ ${LDFLAGS+LDFLAGS="${LDFLAGS}"} --enable-shared --enable-static \ --with-jpeg=${JPEG} --with-zlib=${ZLIB} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
